abilities.name: OL45
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage, ignoring armor. Headshot: inflict 1 vulnerable

upgrades.name: Brace
upgrades.description: While in cover, attacks gain +1 max range and push 1 on hit.

upgrades.name: Tactical Reload
upgrades.description: Gain Headshot: reload and gain 1 strength

upgrades.name: Scavenge Ammo
upgrades.description: May consume one adjacent corpse before or after ACTing to reload and gain 1 strength.

abilities.name: Skull Crack
abilities.description: On hit: 2 damage and push 1. Headshot: push 2

abilities.name: Flashbang
abilities.description: Effect: 1 fire damage and 1 vulnerable, then Splash (target): push 1 away from target.

abilities.name: Shieldwall
abilities.description: Effect: Until start of this unit’s next turn, this unit cannot MOVE, step, or be pushed or pulled; gains cover, and grants cover to adjacent allies from all directions.

upgrades.name: Shield Charge
upgrades.description: Unit may step 1 before using Skull Crack and it gains splash (self) push foes 1

upgrades.name: Bulwark
upgrades.description: Shieldwall also clears up to two negative tokens on self or adjacent allies.

upgrades.name: Bone Dust Napalm
upgrades.description: Flashbang deals 1 splash fire damage but no longer deals vuln or damage to its main target.

abilities.name: Regurgitate Ammo
abilities.description: Effect: A unit in range reloads and gains one, (6+) or two strength.

abilities.name: Bone Shards
abilities.description: Effect: Unit takes 1 damage after any ACT ability resolves that pushes or pulls them. Lasts until end of this unit’s next turn or until this unit has taken a damage this way.

abilities.name: Destructive Glee
abilities.description: Effect: Step 1, then Splash (self): 1 fire damage, push 1, and inflict 1 vulnerable, then self is obliterated.

upgrades.name: Vomit Bullets
upgrades.description: Bone shards gains effect: (4+) push 1, (6) push 1 again.

upgrades.name: Napalm Injector
upgrades.description: Destructive Glee’s splash effect gains effect (4+): +1 fire damage (6+): and +1 vulnerable

upgrades.name: Hot Chamber
upgrades.description: Regurgitate Ammo can target two different adjacent units, but no longer grants strength.

abilities.name: Snipe
abilities.description: On hit: 2 damage. Headshot: and inflict 1 vulnerable.

abilities.name: Transform to Gun
abilities.description: Effect: Unit becomes unable to MOVE or step, but ranged abilities gain +2 maximum range and ignore armor and cover. It can end this effect by sacrificing a MOVE, but if it does, it loses all associate effects.

abilities.name: Deathmark
abilities.description: Effect: Inflict 2 vulnerable, (3+): 3 vulnerable, (5+): Remove any vitality first.

upgrades.name: Claw Pitons
upgrades.description: Transform to Gun makes this unit immune to push and pull.

upgrades.name: Extended Barrel
upgrades.description: Snipe gains +1D when this unit is in cover, and -1D when it is not.

upgrades.name: Caliber Up
upgrades.description: Snipe gains 1 splash and Headshot: push 2

traits.name: Siege Shield
traits.description: May be used as a cover object by allies

abilities.name: Juggernaut
abilities.description: Step 1, then splash (self) push foes 1. (5+) push foes 2. May move into and destroy walls with this step.

abilities.name: Mortar
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage then Splash: 1 fire damage. Headshot: +1 damage on main target

abilities.name: Catechism Devil Cannon
abilities.description: Line 5, 1 fire damage. Inflicts 1 vulnerable on the first unit in the line. Pierces through walls and can target through walls.

upgrades.name: Fortify
upgrades.description: Juggernaut also clears all negative tokens.

upgrades.name: Heavy Caliber Cannon
upgrades.description: Catechism pushes all units in the line 1 space and destroys all walls.

upgrades.name: Gunner Pivot
upgrades.description: When at least one ally is adjacent to this unit, Mortar ignores cover.

traits.name: Hot Clip
traits.description: Once a round, reloading grants you 1 strength and causes your next attack to inflict +1 vulnerable on hit.

abilities.name: Akimbo
abilities.description: On hit: 2 damage. Effect (4+): One other foe in range takes 1 damage, (6+): one other foe in range takes 1 damage.

soulAbilities.name: Reload Slide
soulAbilities.description: Step 1, then you or an adjacent ally reload.

soulAbilities.name: Bullet Time
soulAbilities.description: Clear one (5+) or two negative tokens. Ranged attacks automatically miss you until the end of your next turn (5+) and you are immune to splash and line damage for the duration.

upgrade.name: Bone Wall
upgrade.description: You can use your units as cover. While in cover your abilities gain +2 range.

upgrade.name: Gun Kata
upgrade.description: Ranged attacks gain a minimum range of 1 and push units 1 if they are adjacent.

upgrade.name: Clutch Reload
upgrade.description: Your ranged attacks gain headshot: reload.

upgrade.name: Grenade Jump
upgrade.description: Effect: Splash (self): 1 fire damage, then step 2 with free movement.

upgrade.name: Armor Lock
upgrade.description: Effect: Push all adjacent foes 1. Until the end of your next turn, you gain super armor, cover from all directions, and allied units can use as a cover object. You cannot MOVE, step or be pushed or pulled for the same duration.

upgrade.name: Devil Bullet
upgrade.description: Effect: Reload. Your next attack ignores armor, and automatically triggers headshot effects on hit.

upgrade.name: Superkick
upgrade.description: Effect: Push an adjacent unit 3. Foes gain 1 vulnerable if they would be pushed into a wall or elevated space.

upgrade.name: LV4 Living Cannon
upgrade.description: On hit: 1 fire damage and 1 vulnerable. Splash (target): 1 fire damage. Headshot: Splash (target) 1 vulnerable. *Effect: Must reload twice before this is usable.

upgrade.name: SG88 two barrel shotgun
upgrade.description: On hit: 1 damage, then 1 damage. Effect: push 1, then push 1. Headshot: Reload.

upgrade.name: Unholy Sixgun
upgrade.description: On hit: 2 damage. Headshot: this attack deals +1 base damage on hit for the rest of combat, up to a maximum of 4.

upgrade.name: Double Tap
upgrade.description: Trigger: you reduce a unit to exactly 1 hp. Effect: you may immediately activate this ability to deal 1 damage to it, ignoring armor.

upgrade.name: Frag Bullet
upgrade.description: Trigger: You hit an attack. Effect: Target gains 3 vulnerable after the ability resolves.

upgrade.name: Bullet hustle
upgrade.description: Trigger: After any unit MOVEs. Effect: Step 2, then deal 1 damage to a unit in range 3.

upgrade.name: Overwatch
upgrade.description: Effect: Reload. Until the start of your next turn, enemy units entering adjacent spaces without being pushed or pulled there take 1 damage and are pushed 1, interrupting their movement. This effect can only trigger once a turn.

upgrade.name: Bullet Sonata
upgrade.description: Effect: Every foe in range 2 takes 1 damage, ignoring armor, and is pushed 1.

upgrade.name: S.T.G.
upgrade.description: Trigger: Headshot. Effect: Deal 6 devil damage to the targeted unit, sending them Straight to the Grave.
